script.name: !job.scavenge
script.sourceplaintext:
$table.sectors = table alloc $sector.idle.remaining = 5
if [OWNER] != Player $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 do if $rnd < 30 = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Jumpdrive end
* idle in a sector while [TRUE]
if $sector.idle.remaining <= 0 $sector.idle.remaining = 5 gosub sub.DumpWares end
* now find flying wares to catch while [TRUE] [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_IDLE target=null target2=null par1=null par2=null @ = [THIS] -> move around 10000 ms
$sector = [SECTOR] gosub sub.FindWares
if $flying.wares $sector.idle.remaining = 5 while size of array $flying.wares gosub sub.CatchWare $free.space = [THIS] -> get free volume of cargo bay if $free.space <= 10 gosub sub.DumpWares break end end end
$current.sector = [SECTOR] gosub sub.MoveSector do if $current.sector == [SECTOR] break end
gosub sub.IdleSector end
return null
* =========================================== * SUB: Dumps wares at the nearest pirate base * =========================================== sub.DumpWares: $ret.Done = [FALSE] * find a homebase to delivery goods too $true.owner = [THIS] -> get true owner $bases = get station array: of race $true.owner class/type=Dock
$tBases = table alloc $i = size of array $bases while $i dec $i = $base = $bases[$i] $base.sector = $base -> get sector if is valid route between sectors [SECTOR] and $base.sector if $base -> is docking possible of [THIS] $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $base.sector $tBases[$base] = $jumps end end end if size of table $tBases while [THIS] -> is docked @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : end $remaining.wares = 0 $dumped.wares = 0 $keys = get keys: table=$tBases $data = get data: table=$tBases $keys = sort array: data=$keys sort values=$data while size of array $keys $base = $keys[0] remove element from array $keys at index 0 while [DOCKEDAT] != $base skip if $base -> exists break [THIS] ->set destination to $base [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_DOCKAT target=$base target2=null par1=null par2=null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$base @ = wait 100 ms end skip if $base -> exists continue $aWares = [THIS] -> get tradeable ware array from ship $i = size of array $aWares while $i dec $i = $ware = $aWares[$i] if not [DOCKEDAT] -> trades with ware $ware [DOCKEDAT] ->add temporary ware: ware=$ware end $amt = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $free.amt = [DOCKEDAT] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $amt = get maximum, $amt, $free.amt, null, null, null $amt = [THIS] -> unload $amt units of $ware $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware $dumped.wares = $dumped.wares + ( $ware.vol * $amt ) $amt = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $remaining.wares = $remaining.wares + ( $ware.vol * $amt ) end @ = wait randomly from 10000 to 30000 ms $ret.Done = [TRUE] do if $remaining.wares < 10 break end end endsub
* =========================================== * SUB: resupply energy cells if using jumpdrive * =========================================== sub.Resupply: $ret.Done = [FALSE] if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay $energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $needed = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector [SECTOR] $needed = $needed * 5 if $energy < $needed $needed = $needed * 3 $price = get max price of ware Energy Cells $station = find station: product Energy Cells with min. jumps: max.price=$price, amount=$needed, max.jumps=2, startsector=[SECTOR], trader=[THIS], exclude array=null if $station -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$station if [THIS] -> is docked = [THIS] -> buy $needed units of Energy Cells @ = wait randomly from 20000 to 60000 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : $ret.Done = [TRUE] end end end end endsub
* =========================================== * SUB: move to a new sector to idle * =========================================== sub.IdleSector: $size = size of table $table.sectors do if $size > 10 clear table $table.sectors
gosub sub.Resupply do if $ret.Done endsub
$free.space = [THIS] -> get free volume of cargo bay if $free.space <= 10 gosub sub.DumpWares do if $ret.Done endsub end
$sectors = [THIS] -> find all sectors within 3 jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE] $i = size of array $sectors while $i dec $i = $sector = $sectors[$i] if $table.sectors[$sector] remove element from array $sectors at index $i end end
if not size of array $sectors clear table $table.sectors $sectors = [THIS] -> find all sectors within 5 jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE] end
if size of array $sectors $i = size of array $sectors $i = random value from 0 to $i - 1 $sector = $sectors[$i] $table.sectors[$sector] = [TRUE] [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_MOVE_SECTOR target=$sector target2=null par1=null par2=null while $sector != [SECTOR] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$sector @ = wait 100 ms end end dec $sector.idle.remaining = [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_IDLE target=null target2=null par1=null par2=null $rnd = random value from 90000 to 150000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> move around $rnd ms endsub
* =========================================== * SUB: Find next sector to fly to * =========================================== sub.MoveSector: $range = 2 $can.jump = [FALSE] if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay $energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $needed = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector [SECTOR] $jumps = $energy / $needed dec $jumps = if $jumps >= 2 [THIS] ->set autojump active: [TRUE] [THIS] ->autojump minimum jumps= 1 $can.jump = [TRUE] $range = $jumps do if $range > 10 $range = 10 end end
$target.sectors = table alloc $sectors = [THIS] -> find all sectors within $range jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE] $i = size of array $sectors while $i dec $i = $sector = $sectors[$i] gosub sub.FindWares if $flying.wares if size of array $flying.wares $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $sector $target.sectors[$sector] = $jumps end end end
$target = null while size of table $target.sectors $sectors = get keys: table=$target.sectors $jumps = get data: table=$target.sectors $sectors = sort array: data=$sectors sort values=$jumps
$sector = $sectors[0] if not is valid route between sectors [SECTOR] and $sector remove key $sector from table $target.sectors else $target = $sector break end end if $target [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_MOVE_SECTOR target=$target target2=null par1=null par2=null while $target != [SECTOR] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$target @ = wait 100 ms end end endsub
* =========================================== * SUB: Catch a flying ware * =========================================== sub.CatchWare: skip if $flying.wares endsub skip if size of array $flying.wares endsub $catch.ware = $flying.wares[0] remove element from array $flying.wares at index 0 if $catch.ware -> exists [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_COLLECT_WARE target=$catch.ware target2=null par1=null par2=null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.collectware : GALOBJ of flying ware=$catch.ware destroy only=[FALSE] end endsub
* =========================================== * SUB: Find all valid flying wares in sector * =========================================== sub.FindWares: $flags = [Find.Nearest] | [Find.Multiple] $flying.wares = find flying ware: sector=$sector maintype=null subtype=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=null maxnum=100, refpos=null if $flying.wares $ware.i = size of array $flying.wares while $ware.i dec $ware.i = $catch.ware = $flying.wares[$ware.i] if not $catch.ware -> is of class Ware Container remove element from array $flying.wares at index $ware.i continue end * dont collect anything tagged with discovery points (player only) if $catch.ware ->get discovery points remove element from array $flying.wares at index $ware.i continue end if $catch.ware ->is flying ware blueprint remove element from array $flying.wares at index $ware.i continue end $amt = $catch.ware -> get flying ware count $ware = $catch.ware -> get ware type code of object if not [THIS] -> can transport ware $ware remove element from array $flying.wares at index $ware.i continue end if not [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay remove element from array $flying.wares at index $ware.i continue end * dont collect upgrade (ie engine/rudder), these are player only
if is upgrade: ware=$ware remove element from array $flying.wares at index $ware.i continue end end end endsub return null
